query: Provide a list of commands to configure 16 switch ports start at 192.168.0.1/24?
response:
To configure 16 switch ports starting at 192.168.0.1/24, you can use the following commands:
```bash
# Configure the first switch port
nv set interface swp192s0 ip address 192.168.0.1/24

# Configure the remaining 15 switch ports
for i in {2..16}; do
    nv set interface swp192s$i ip address 192.168.0.$((i))/24
done
```
This will configure 16 switch ports starting at 192.168.0.1/24 with unique IP addresses within the subnet.

query: What command to use enable RoCE in lossless mode?
response:
To enable RoCE in lossless mode, use the following command:
```bash
nv set qos roce enable on
nv set qos roi mode lossless
```
This command enables RoCE in lossless mode.

query: Enable layer 3 VLAN interfaces for N/S network for port 10.130.121.2/24?
response:
To enable layer 3 VLAN interfaces for the N/S network for port 10.130.121.2/24, you can use the following command:
```bash
nv set interface vlan121 ip address 10.130.121.2/24
```
This command sets the IP address of the VLAN interface `vlan121` to `10.130.121.2/24`. This will enable layer 3 VLAN interfaces for the N/S network for port `10.130.121.2/24`.
